name: Pixel 30
description: MAXEMA® - A Top Italian Brand. The Pixel which interprets contemporary fashion trends perfectly. An essential line and a sober, perfectly dosed elegance are expressed in its square. The design of the push-button top combines captivating styling and compliance with the requirements of EU law regarding small components: the boreholes allow enough air to pass to prevent suffocation were someone to swallow it. The broad, essential clip proudly underlines the silhouette of the Pixel, a pen that was conceived to contribute successfully to the corporate image of companies projected into the future. Colourful barrel, clip and top button in transparent finish, retractable ventilated push-button, made of non-toxic, highly resistant ABS plastic. X-20 refill available in black or blue ink, up to 2000 metres of writing.
additionalInfo: Italian Design and Make. Exclusive to Dex Collection in Australia and New Zealand.  1,000 units minium per colour.
productDisclaimer: GST additional. Other additional charges may apply. We reserve the right to change prices and charges without notice.
